$description:
| What does this do? | Enables Customer Lockbox, requires explicit administrator approval for Microsoft support to access tenant data and provides an auditable approval trail. |
| Why should you use this? | Protects organizational data from inadvertent or unauthorized access and data spillage, and provides governance and compliance evidence by enforcing an approval workflow and audit logs. |
| What is the end-user impact? | Administrators must approve Microsoft support access requests which may introduce minor delays during troubleshooting; there is no direct impact on normal user operations. |
| Learn more | [Customer Lockbox overview](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/security/fundamentals/customer-lockbox-overview) |
